casebody.data:
FINAN, et al.
v.
CHILD PROTECTIVE SERVICE 7P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 7, 2019 Melinda Finan, for Finan, Melinda

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of January 2019 by Plaintiff for Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of January 2019."
